RelatedSentence: Dominique Strauss - Kahn is to take legal action over US director Abel Ferrara 's film  Welcome to New York , which is inspired by the sex scandal that brought down the former IMF chief .

RelatedSentence: Speaking on Europe 1 , Strauss - Kahn 's lawyer Jean Veil said that in the coming days he would file suit for defamation over the accusations of rape and the insinuations made all throughout the movie Veil said DSK was sickened and frightened by this film , which tells a story which is similar to the events which led to DSK 's downfall in 2011 .
